perturbation.original_text: Fox grants to Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with the Property “ICE AGE: THE MELTDOWN” in the United States: (A) 2 Scrat voicetones; (B) 2 John Leguizamo voicetones; and (C) 3 premium videos. Fox also grants Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with the Property “ICE AGE 2” outside of the United States: (A) 4 Scrat voicetones; (B) 1 John Leguizamo voicetone; and (C) 3 premium videos.
perturbation.changed_text: Fox grants to Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with the Property “ICE AGE: THE MELTDOWN” in the United States: (A) 2 Scrat voicetones; (B) 2 John Leguizamo voicetones; and (C) 3 premium videos. Fox may, at its sole discretion, grant Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with the Property “ICE AGE 2” outside of the United States: (A) 4 Scrat voicetones; (B) 1 John Leguizamo voicetone; and (C) 3 premium videos.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that Fox 'grants' rights outside of the United States, implying an obligation. The modified text changes this to 'Fox may, at its sole discretion, grant', giving Fox the option not to grant these rights, thus contradicting the initial grant of rights.

perturbation.original_text:
In consideration of the rights granted to Licensee pursuant to this Amendment 2, Licensee shall pay to Fox, or such other party as Fox may designate in writing, a royalty in the following amount:
(a) From the first unit sold, Fox shall earn a royalty at the rate of ***** percent (*****%) of Licensee’s Gross Receipts (as defined in the Agreement) from Licensee’s sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products.
perturbation.changed_text:
In consideration of the rights granted to Licensee pursuant to this Amendment 2, Licensee may pay to Fox, or such other party as Fox may designate in writing, a royalty in an amount to be determined by Fox. 
(a) The royalty rate, if any, will be determined at Fox's sole discretion and may not be based on a percentage of Licensee's Gross Receipts.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that Licensee 'shall pay' a royalty and defines the calculation method based on percentage of Gross Receipts. The modified version contradicts this by stating Licensee 'may pay' a royalty, removing the obligation, and then saying that royalty if applied 'will be determined at Fox's sole discretion', taking away the calculation method, which creates enforcement issues.

perturbation.original_text: Licensee shall not be entitled to receive a share of any revenues and shall have no claim to any revenues earned and collected by Fox, or a third-party Fox designates, for the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products which Fox distributes through its and its assigns’ direct-to-consumer distribution channels.
perturbation.changed_text: Licensee may be entitled to receive a share of any revenues if determined by Fox's financial department; any possible shares will be determined by the company itself. Any possible claims to any revenues earned and collected by Fox, or a third-party Fox designates, for the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products which Fox distributes through its and its assigns’ direct-to-consumer distribution channels will be determined on a case by case basis by the financial department, if it does happen.
perturbation.explanation: The original text explicitly prohibits Licensee from receiving revenue shares from Fox's direct-to-consumer distribution channels. The modified text contradicts this by stating Licensee 'may be entitled' to a share, based on internal decisions of Fox, creating uncertainty and a possible legal dispute.
